name: Block The Ball (ionic101)
description:
Stop the huge ball! You have only 60 seconds to build a barricade of cubes which can stop the ball. Don't waste your time! Think, experiment, come up with new options for barricades! Only you can stop this huge ball!

Control:

WASD - move

SPACE - jump

LMB - take/throw a cube

ESC - pause game
